title: AI-Powered Code Reviewer
description: A tool that leverages machine learning to automatically review code for common errors and style inconsistencies, providing actionable feedback to developers.
whyIBuiltThis: To explore AI applications in developer productivity and improve code quality.
challenges: Optimizing the model for real-time feedback.

title: Interactive Data Visualization Dashboard
description: A web application for visualizing complex datasets with interactive charts and graphs, helping users to uncover insights and trends.
whyIBuiltThis: To make data more accessible and understandable through dynamic visualizations.

title: Real-time Collaborative Whiteboard
description: A collaborative whiteboard application allowing multiple users to draw and brainstorm together in real-time, built with WebSockets.
whyIBuiltThis: To create a seamless real-time collaboration tool for remote teams.
